info.title: Spotify Web
info.description: The Spotify Web API enables you to search and lookup metadata about artists, tracks and albums using a REST interface.

parameters.name: extras
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of words that defines the detail level expected in the response

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: A search string encoded in UTF-8; required
